content:
From time to time I find myself clicking on the (EDITED) tag to the left of messages expecting to see the changes. What I do get, though, is the compose box opening.
Would it not be a lot more intuitive for the Edited tag to show the popover with the changes that have been made to the message?
yeah, that makes sense; good catch! Feel free to open an issue or PR.
Yeah, agreed this would be a very reasonable feature.

I guess when you do that, add a hover effect too (change the foreground to blue as that of other links maybe). Since the whole message box has the same pointer cursor, it might feel odd that clicking on the edited tag does something weird because I personally never felt that it should do something different.
good point. I would just change it from whatever opacity it is to opacity 1 on hover.
I've clicked it several times hoping to see the previous edits, even though I know it's not the correct method. So +1 from me.
